title: Posibles intercambios
friendHas: Cartas que necesitas (y tu amigo tiene)
youHave: Cartas que tu amigo necesita (y tú tienes)
noPossibleTradesDescription: No hay intercambios entre tú y tu amigo en este momento.
featureDescription: Este diálogo te mostrará los posibles intercambios entre tus cartas y las de la ID de amigo seleccionada. Te muestra cartas duplicadas que la otra parte aún no posee.
ownCollectionDescription: Considera compartir esta página con otros para que puedan encontrar posibles intercambios.
noTradeOffers: No trades yet, head to the community to find someone to trade with!
noTradePartners: We couldn't find anyone for you to trade with.
inActiveTradePage: The user "{{username}}" is currently not accepting any trades.
inActiveTradeDescription: Their trading page is set to disabled. Please contact them if you want to trade.
collectionUpdated: Your collection has been updated to reflect the traded cards.
noAccount: First set up your account using 'Edit profile' in the top right corner.
isActiveTradingDisabledTooltip: Debes hacer público tu perfil antes de habilitar el intercambio activo.
toCollectTooltip: The amount of cards you want to collect by trading. Tip: Set this value to 0 to exclude a rarity from trading.
toKeepTooltip: The minimum amount of cards you want to trade down to.
